short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share links on Turtle with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share links directly out of your browser on turtle.community.

With this add-on you no longer have to log in and copy-paste the link out of your browser tab. Just share it by pressing Ctrl+SPACE without any interruption.
